ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
Boutiques is a tool to automatically publish, integrate, and
execute applications across computational platforms. Boutiques
applications are summarized in a simple yet rich JSON description,
and enable the simulation, validation, evaluation, and
application-specific monitoring of command-line tools.
about.summary: An implementation of JSON Schema validation for Python

about.description:
Boutiques is a tool to automatically publish, integrate, and
execute applications across computational platforms. Boutiques
applications are summarized in a simple yet rich JSON description,
and enable the simulation, validation, evaluation, and
application-specific monitoring of command-line tools.
about.summary: An implementation of JSON Schema validation for Python

name: boutiques
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "boutiques" %}
{% set version = "0.5.31" %}
{% set python_min = "3.9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/boutiques-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fd772f3776052a7670efafd2f5a7afe92a60f0e8b00f83a3c34455de991bd845

build:
  entry_points:
    - bosh=boutiques.bosh:bosh
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - hatchling
    - hatch-vcs
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - simplejson
    - termcolor
    - jsonschema
    - tabulate

test:
  imports:
    - boutiques
  commands:
    - pip check
    - bosh version
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip

about:
  home: http://github.com/boutiques/boutiques
  summary: An implementation of JSON Schema validation for Python
  description: |
    Boutiques is a tool to automatically publish, integrate, and
    execute applications across computational platforms. Boutiques
    applications are summarized in a simple yet rich JSON description,
    and enable the simulation, validation, evaluation, and
    application-specific monitoring of command-line tools.
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: http://boutiques.github.io/doc/
  dev_url: https://github.com/boutiques/boutiques


extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - Dhananjhay
